snippet: Another investigation into racism allegations at an English soccer match was started after a Bolton player said he was abused by Millwall supporters.
abstract: Another investigation into racism allegations at an English soccer match is started after Bolton striker Marvin Sordell says he was abused by Millwall supporters.
lead_paragraph: Another investigation into racism allegations at an English soccer match was started after a Bolton player said he was abused by Millwall supporters.

headline.seo: Racism Claim by Bolton Striker Marvin Sordell Investigated
headline.main: Racism Claim by Bolton Player Investigated
